values.help: Turn on the module when the attached load is connected
values.label: Load Sensing

values.help: This dimmer will start dimming from its current level.
values.label: Ignore Start-Level (Receiving)

values.help: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.
values.label: On/Off Command Dim Step

values.help: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.
values.label: On/Off Command Dim Rate

values.help: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.
values.label: Local Control Dim Step

values.help: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.
values.label: Local Control Dim Rate

values.help: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.
values.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Step

values.help: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.
values.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Rate
